languages.text: "Немалых. Я — самая влиятельная фигура в Просторе. Каллигоса прикончили ксеносы, а его наследник, Эвейн, стал моей марионеткой. Инцендия носится за пиратами, не замечая, как я граблю ее колонии. Мне удалось заключить пакт с кабалом Опустошительной бури против Калькасара, и он вынужден был бежать от меня. Я предпринял{mf||а} с десяток походов в неизведанное, перенес{mf||ла} столицу династии на Футфол, сделал{mf||а} Владайма своим губернатором, а Иеронимуса — кардиналом. Не так уж мало для новичка?"

"Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"
languages.original_text: "Немалых. Я — самая влиятельная фигура в Просторе. Каллигоса прикончили ксеносы, а его наследник, Эвейн, стал моей марионеткой. Инцендия носится за пиратами, не замечая, как я граблю ее колонии. Мне удалось заключить пакт с кабалом Опустошительной бури против Калькасара, и он вынужден был бежать от меня. Я предпринял{mf||а} с десяток походов в неизведанное, перенес{mf||ла} столицу династии на Футфол, сделал{mf||а} Владайма своим губернатором, а Иеронимуса — кардиналом. Не так уж мало для новичка?"

traits.locale_text: "Quite. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos, and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realizing it is I who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, made Vladaym a governor and Hieronimus a cardinal. Surely this is not too bad for a newcomer?"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

traits.locale_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: « C'est exact. Je suis la personne la plus influente de toutes les Étendues. Calligos s'est fait tuer par les xénos et Evayne, son successeur, est devenu mon pantin. Incendia chasse les pirates sans se rendre compte que c'est moi qui attaque ses colonies. J'ai pu conclure un pacte avec la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse contre Calcazar, ce qui l'a forcé à fuir. J'ai entrepris une douzaine d'expéditions vers l'inconnu, déplacé la capitale de la dynastie à Castel, nommé Vladaym gouverneur et Hiéronymus cardinal. Pas mal, pour {mf|un|une} novice, vous ne croyez pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"

traits.locale_text: « Beaucoup de choses. Je suis la personne la plus influente de toutes les Étendues. Calligos s'est fait tuer par les xénos et Evayne, son successeur, est devenu mon pantin. Incendia chasse les pirates sans se rendre compte que c'est moi qui attaque ses colonies. J'ai pu conclure un pacte avec la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse contre Calcazar, ce qui l'a forcé à fuir. J'ai entrepris une douzaine d'expéditions vers l'inconnu, déplacé la capitale de la dynastie à Castel, nommé Vladaym gouverneur et Hiéronymus cardinal. Pas mal, pour {mf|un débutant|une débutante}, vous ne croyez pas ? »
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: «Efectivamente. Soy la figura más influyente de la Extensión. Calligos murió a manos de los xenos y su sucesor Evayne no es más que un títere. Incendia persigue a piratas sin darse cuenta de que yo soy quien asalta sus colonias. Logré forjar un pacto con la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora contra Calcazar, obligándolo a huir. He emprendido una docena de expediciones a lo desconocido, trasladado la capital de la dinastía a Paso, convertido a Vladaym en gobernador y a Hieronymus en cardenal. No está mal para un{mf||a} advenediz{mf|o|a}, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"

traits.locale_text: «Sí. Soy la figura más influyente de la Extensión. Calligos murió a manos de los xenos y su sucesor Evayne no es más que un títere. Incendia persigue a piratas sin darse cuenta de que yo soy quien asalta sus colonias. Logré forjar un pacto con la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora contra Calcazar, obligándolo a huir. He emprendido una docena de expediciones a lo desconocido, trasladado la capital de la dinastía a Paso, convertido a Vladaym en gobernador y a Hyeronimus en cardenal. No está mal para un{mf||a} advenediz{mf|o|a}, ¿verdad?».
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: “确实如此，我成了科罗努斯扩区最有影响力的人物。卡里戈斯死在了异形手里，而他的继任者艾维尼成了我的傀儡。因森蒂娅一心一意追杀海盗，却没有意识到我才是掠夺她的幕后黑手。我和狂风阴谋团结成了联盟，一起对付卡尔卡扎，把他赶出了那片星区。我在未知的星系进行了几十场探险，把王朝首都搬到了落脚港，任命弗拉迪姆当那里的总督，还任命希罗尼穆斯当了我的红衣主教。对一介新人行商浪人来说，我干得还不赖，你说是吧？”
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"

traits.locale_text: “一点都没错，我成了科罗努斯扩区最有影响力的人物。卡里戈斯死在了异形手里，而他的继任者艾维尼成了我的傀儡。因森蒂娅一心一意追杀海盗，却没有意识到我才是掠夺她的幕后黑手。我和狂风阴谋团结成了联盟，一起对付卡尔卡扎，把他赶出了那片星区。我在未知的星系进行了几十场探险，把王朝首都搬到了落脚港，任命弗拉迪姆当那里的总督，还任命希罗尼穆斯当了我的红衣主教。对一介新人行商浪人来说，我干得还不赖，你说是吧？”
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: 「その通りだ。私はエクスパンスで最も影響力のある存在だ。カリゴスは異種族に殺され、後継者のエヴァインは私の操り人形となった。インセンディアは海賊を追いかけているが、コロニーを襲撃しているのが私だとは気づいていない。私はカルカサルに対抗するため、陰謀団『略奪の嵐』と協定を結び、彼を追放した。未知の世界への遠征を何度も敢行し、王朝の首都をフットフォールに移し、ヴラダイムを総督に、ヒエロニムスを枢機卿に任命した。新参者にしては、なかなかだとは思わないか？」
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"

traits.locale_text: 「その通りだ。私はエクスパンスで最も影響力のある存在だ。カリゴスは異種族に殺され、後継者のエヴァインは私の操り人形となった。インセンディアは海賊を追いかけているが、コロニーを襲撃しているのが私だとは気づいていない。私はカルカサルに対抗するため、陰謀団『略奪の嵐』と協定を結び、彼を追放した。未知の世界への遠征を何度も敢行し、王朝の首都をフットフォールに移し、ヴラダイムを総督に、ヒエロニムスを枢機卿に任命した。新参者にしては、なかなかだとは思わないか？」
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Oh ja. Ich bin die einflussreichste Person in der gesamten Ausdehnung. Calligos wurde von den Xenos getötet, sein Nachfolger Evayne wurde zu meiner Marionette. Incendia jagt Piraten, ohne zu ahnen, dass in Wahrheit ich ihre Kolonien überfalle. Ich konnte einen Pakt mit der Kabale des plündernden Sturms eingehen, einen Pakt gegen Calcazar, woraufhin er fliehen musste. Ich habe ein Dutzend Expeditionen ins Unbekannte unternommen, habe die Hauptstadt der Dynastie nach Footfall verlegt, habe Vladaym zum Gouverneur ernannt und Hieronymus zum Kardinal. Nicht übel für einen Neuling, meint Ihr nicht?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"

traits.locale_text: "Wohl wahr. Ich bin die einflussreichste Person in der gesamten Ausdehnung. Calligos wurde von den Xenos getötet, sein Nachfolger Evayne wurde zu meiner Marionette. Incendia jagt Piraten, ohne zu ahnen, dass in Wahrheit ich ihre Kolonien überfalle. Ich konnte einen Pakt mit der Kabale des plündernden Sturms eingehen, einen Pakt gegen Calcazar, woraufhin er fliehen musste. Ich habe ein Dutzend Expeditionen ins Unbekannte unternommen, habe die Hauptstadt der Dynastie nach Footfall verlegt, habe Vladaym zum Gouverneur ernannt und Hieronimus zum Kardinal. Nicht übel für einen Neuling, meint Ihr nicht?"
traits.speaker: RTNeutralFemale

languages.text: "Oldum tabii. Enginlik'teki en nüfuzlu kişiyim ben. Calligos'u zenolar öldürdü, Evayne de benim kuklam oldu. İncendia, kolonilerini yağmalayanın ben olduğumu fark etmeden korsanları kovalıyor. Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'yla Calcazar'a karşı bir anlaşma imzaladım ve Calcazar'ı kaçmaya zorladım. Bilinmeyene doğru onlarca keşif düzenledim, hanedanlık başkentini Binliman'a taşıdım, Vladaym'ı vali ilan ettim ve Hieronymus'u kardinal yaptım. Bir acemi için hiç fena değil, sence?"
languages.original_text: "Indeed I have. I am the most influential figure in the entire Expanse. Calligos was slain by the xenos and his successor Evayne became my puppet. Incendia chases pirates, not realising it is me who is raiding her colonies. I was able to make a pact with the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest against Calcazar, forcing him to flee. I undertook a dozen expeditions into the unknown, moved the dynasty capital to Footfall, named Vladaym my governor and made Hieronymus a cardinal. Not too bad for a novice, wouldn't you say?"
